content.text:
<thinking>The user requested a health check for all services. The tool results show:

1. Account service: 200 OK with operational status
2. Ledger service: 200 OK with proper configuration
3. Card service: 200 OK and operational

All three services returned successful health checks with:
- HTTP 200 status codes
- Operational confirmations
- No error indicators

Following protocol requirements:
- All services must be healthy to report HEALTHY
- No partial status allowed
- Must use exact "HEALTHY" text

Will report final combined status as HEALTHY.</thinking> HEALTHY
